tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ComplianceMonitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry VARCHAR(100),
    energy_source VARCHAR(100),
    energy_usage DECIMAL(10, 2),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE RenewableEnergyRegulations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
    regulation_description TEXT,
    industry_affected VARCHAR(100),
    deadline DATE,
    regulatory_body VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance_Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    policy_id INT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    report_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES Energy_Companies(company_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES Renewable_Energy_Policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_policies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_id INT,
  policy_name VARCHAR(100),
  policy_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE industry_compliance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_id INT,
  policy_id INT,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE government_agencies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(100),
  agency_contact VARCHAR(100),
  agency_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE industry_details (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_name VARCHAR(100),
  industry_description TEXT,
  industry_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_id INT,
  policy_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  compliance_level INT
)
